title: after windows 10 update, FPS locked at 60 with GAME DVR CLOSED
body:
usually with the GAME DVR closed, fps should be fine. 
but today after the computer updated win10, the fps drops from 150 to 60, sometimes 30-40. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
would somebody help me? 
my XBOX game DVR was disabled,  NVIDIA was updated, and Vsync was turned off
thank you!

replies.body:
Solution :

Right click on the shortcut lol >> Properties >> Compatibility and disable full screen optimization :)

Have a good day !
Thanks man this worked for me. The windows game DVR was already off but still stuck at 60fps I was going crazy.

You made a few good first steps by checking the gameDVR and checking for Nvidia updates, but let's make sure we hit all the most common fps issues. Check out our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) and you should be able to get those frames back up to speed.
